## Cheezy Mac 

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| 2 dinner, 2 lunch  | ~40 min | Can't find original source | 


### Ingredients:

- 16oz pasta
- 1 cup yellow potatos, peeled and diced
- &frac14; cup carrots, peeled and diced
- &frac13; cup onions, peeled and diced
- &frac34; cup water (from pot of boiled veggies)
- &frac12; cup raw cashews
- &frac14; cup coconut milk
- 2 TBSP nutritional yeast
- 1 TBSP lemon juice
- &frac34; tsp salt
- &frac14; tsp garlic powder
- &frac18; tsp paprika

### Directions 

- Boil carrots, potato, and onion for ~10 minutes until fork tender
- Blend all ingredients (except pasta) into blender on high for 45-60 seconds
- Pour over and mix with pasta  
  *Additions:*
  * Truffle sauce
  * peas/broccoli
  

### Queso Sauce 

To make Queso Sauce add:

- &frac12; tsp chili powder
- &frac12; tsp cumin
- 4oz can of green chilis
- Black bean and cilantro (after blending)
